content:
BEGININPUT
BEGINCONTEXT
url: https://www.history.com/topics/great-wall-of-china
ENDCONTEXT
The Great Wall of China is an ancient series of walls and fortifications located in northern China. Built over several centuries by various dynasties, it measures approximately 13,171 miles long. Contrary to popular belief, the Great Wall cannot be seen from space with the naked eye. 
ENDINPUT
BEGININSTRUCTION
Can the Great Wall of China be seen from space?
Cite your source.
ENDINSTRUCTION

No, the Great Wall of China cannot be seen from space with the naked eye. This is a common misconception. According to History.com, "Contrary to popular belief, the Great Wall cannot be seen from space with the naked eye." 

Source: 
History.com. (n.d.). Great Wall of China. Retrieved from https://www.history.com/topics/great-wall-of-china
